queries.querystring: select distinct r.*,count(v.dbn_repv_viewname) Views_Used, min(e.Ref_Status) Extr_Status from dbn_report r, dbn_report_views v, dbn_entities e where (v.dbn_repv_viewname = e.ViewName) and (v.dbn_repv_parid = r.dbn_rep_id) and r.dbn_rep_id ='pRID'

SELECT concat('MRN_SPE05#LI',qry.loan,'#',qry.loan) DD , concat('MRN_SPE01#LLOAN&arg1=',qry.loan) ILIAS ,qry.loan ,qry.OMR ,qry.Org ,concat('MRN_SPE09#01##',qry.store,'#0#',qry.store) 'Store' ,qry.MilID ,qry.name
SELECT concat('MRN_SPE09#05##',qry.nsn,'#0#',qry.nsn) as '______NSN______' , qry.macode as MACODE
, qry.acbg , qry.alb , qry_lot.lot
, sum(qry.QtyLoan) as 'QtyLn' , date(qry.transdate) '_LoanDate_' , date(qry.enddate) '_EndDate_' , qry.description
, case when qry_functions.Supervised=1 then 'Y' end 'Supervised' , qry.Serialised 'Serialised' , qry.Level_HL 'LevelH-L' -- ,qry.firstname
from (select
distinct
mtol.loan ,mel.store ,mel.OMR ,mp.army_number as MilID ,mp.name ,mp.organism as Org
, mtol.transdate , mtol.enddate , mtol.nsn , mtol.open_qty- mtol.OPEN_DISC_QTY as QtyLoan , mn.description , mn.alb , mn.macode , mn.Serialised , mn.Level_HL , mn.acbg ,mel.comments ,mp.firstname
FROM mrqr_transactions_open_loan mtol inner join mrqr_events_loan mel on mtol.loan = mel.transaction inner join mrqr_persons mp on mp.idnr = mel.idnr inner join mrqr_nsn mn on mtol.nsn=mn.nsn
WHERE (length(replace(replace('pNSN','%',''),'_',''))>=3 OR length(replace(replace('pSTORE','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pLOAN','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pARMYID','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pACBG','%',''),'_',''))>=2 ) and if ('pLOAN'='',true,mtol.loan like 'pLOAN') and if ('pARMYID'='',true,mp.army_number like 'pARMYID') and if ('pNSN'='',true, mtol.nsn like 'pNSN') and if ('pSTORE'='',true, mel.store like 'pSTORE') and if ('pENDDATE'='',true, date(mtol.enddate)<= 'pENDDATE') and if ('pDATE'='',true, date(mtol.transdate)>= 'pDATE') and if ('pACBG'='',true, mn.acbg='pACBG') and if ('pATTRACTIVE'='on', mn.attractive='Y',true) )qry
inner join
( select mtb.transaction , mtb.store , mtb.nsn , ml.lot , mtb.transdate from mrqr_transactions_binloc mtb inner join mrqr_lots ml on mtb.lot_reference=ml.lot_reference where (length(replace(replace('pNSN','%',''),'_',''))>=3 OR length(replace(replace('pSTORE','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pLOAN','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pARMYID','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pACBG','%',''),'_',''))>=2 ) and if ('pSTORE'='',true, mtb.store like 'pSTORE') and if ('pNSN'='',true, mtb.nsn like 'pNSN') and if ('pLOAN'='',true,mtb.transaction like 'pLOAN') union
select mtb.transaction , mtb.store , mtb.nsn , ml.lot , mtb.transdate from mrqr_transactions_binloc mtb inner join mrqr_lots ml on mtb.lot_reference=ml.lot_reference where (length(replace(replace('pNSN','%',''),'_',''))>=3 OR length(replace(replace('pSTORE','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pLOAN','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pARMYID','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pACBG','%',''),'_',''))>=2 ) and if ('pSTORE'='',true, mtb.store like 'pSTORE') and if ('pNSN'='',true, mtb.nsn like 'pNSN') and if ('pLOAN'='',true,mtb.transaction like 'pLOAN') )qry_lot on qry_lot.store=qry.store and qry_lot.nsn=qry.nsn and qry_lot.transaction=qry.loan and qry_lot.transdate=qry.transdate
left join ( select distinct dfg.nsn ,dfg.supervised ,dfg.description from daotg4_functions_global dfg inner join mrqr_transactions_open_loan mtol on dfg.nsn=mtol.nsn inner join mrqr_events_loan mel on mtol.loan = mel.transaction inner join mrqr_persons mp on mp.idnr = mel.idnr where (length(replace(replace('pNSN','%',''),'_',''))>=3 OR length(replace(replace('pSTORE','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pLOAN','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pARMYID','%',''),'_',''))>=2 OR length(replace(replace('pACBG','%',''),'_',''))>=2 ) and if ('pSTORE'='',true, mel.store like 'pSTORE') and if ('pLOAN'='',true, mtol.loan like 'pLOAN') and if ('pARMYID'='',true, mp.army_number like 'pARMYID') and if ('pNSN'='',true, mtol.nsn like 'pNSN') )qry_functions on qry.nsn=qry_functions.nsn and qry.alb=qry_functions.description group by qry.loan,qry.nsn
group by loan
